entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023
